faq.question: How quickly can we see results?
faq.answer: Most clients see measurable improvements within 30 days of pilot launch. Full ROI typically lands within 60-90 days.

faq.question: What if we're not technical?
faq.answer: No problem. We handle all technical implementation and provide training for your team. You focus on the outcomes.

faq.question: Can we exit after the Discovery phase?
faq.answer: Absolutely. You keep all Discovery artifacts (audit, architecture, roadmap) with no obligation to continue.

faq.question: Do you work with our existing tools?
faq.answer: Yes. We're vendor-agnostic and integrate with your current stack - CRM, ERP, data warehouse, etc.

faq.question: What about data security?
faq.answer: Security-first approach: encrypted data, no PII in prompts, compliant with HIPAA/GDPR/SOC2. Your data never trains models.
